name: uncle Lem
body:
### About Me

I'm Java Developer with some experience in Android Development, now trying to become JavaEE Developer.

Got master's degree in Informatics (Donetsk National University, Faculty of Mathematics and Information Technology), took up a post of head faculty’s department of Student Scientific Society of Donetsk National University and was a member of faculty's Olympiad programming team.

I'm currently working in ITHouse, LLC as Junior Java Developer and don't looking for a job, but, anyway, my CV can be found [here](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/56575181/Khokhlov%20CV.pdf).

### GitHub Projects

* [Android Utils](http://unclelem.github.io/AndroidUtils/) – several useful classes for Android developers. My proud is ObbExpansionManager class.
* [Customer Quiz](https://github.com/uncleLem/CustomerQuiz) – feel free to watch this code and laugh at man first time trying to do something with Python.
* [MOO of Orion](http://unclelem.github.io/MOO-of-Orion) – just started my own Master of Orion 2 remake for Android.

### Projects

* [Antichess](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ua.a5.antichess) – variation of Loser’s chess. In this project AI was developed by me.
* [Four in Row](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ua.a5.fourinrow) – game was developed using AndEngine framework for OpenGL 2D. My part is: Bluetooth connection, OpenGL activities, AI.
* [Motorcycle & Scooter Parking](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.mcnetwork.motoscooterparking), [Motorcycle Dealers & Workshops](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.mcnetwork.motordealerworkshop) – clones of existing iOS projects. Work with Google Maps, info about pins received from server via JSON.
* Terminal – application, related to payment terminals. Synchronization of local and remote databases, communication with central server using XML, dynamic building of UI (depending on the contents of database and server responses) and so on.
* [e(taxi)](http://etaxi.ua/) – my first experience in JavaEE and web development. Backend, Javascript, Android app etc.
